system.descriptionText: Comrade in Cohesion hunkers down behind nearby cover, for the next round all attacks that hit the comrade must roll damage, if it does not exceed 3+Cover AP the comrade is not damaged. Comrades will not use actively hide behind cover unless this order is given to them.
